## Public Member Functions

### drop&#95;back() {#a25aa9ecfd327d418a3030cc648d751af}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class RefType, class StreamType&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>RefType llvm::BinaryStreamRefBase&lt; RefType, StreamType &gt;::drop&#95;back (uint64&#95;t N) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamref">BinaryStreamRef</a> with the last <code>N</code> elements removed.

If this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamref">BinaryStreamRef</a> is length-tracking and <code>N</code> is greater than 0, then this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamref">BinaryStreamRef</a> will no longer length-track.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamref-h/#l00076">76</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamref-h">BinaryStreamRef.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### drop&#95;front() {#a4232f2228987b39430e8d7a6b48d8188}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class RefType, class StreamType&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>RefType llvm::BinaryStreamRefBase&lt; RefType, StreamType &gt;::drop&#95;front (uint64&#95;t N) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamref">BinaryStreamRef</a> with the first <code>N</code> elements removed.

If this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamref">BinaryStreamRef</a> is length-tracking, then the resulting one will be too.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamref-h/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamref-h">BinaryStreamRef.h</a>.
